videos.alt_text: adidas - Your Future Is Not Mine
videos.title: adidas - Your Future Is Not Mine (2016)
videos.description: The 2016 Adidas commercial "Your Future is Not Mine," directed by Terence Neale, features influential creatives like Aleali May, Luka Sabbat, and Iman Shumpert, among others, who march confidently towards an optimistic future, challenging the preconceived notions of a dystopian tomorrow. This campaign, produced by the advertising agency Johannes Leonardo, emphasizes individual empowerment and the message that one's future is theirs to create, rallying viewers to defy negative expectations and shape their own destinies through creativity and personal initiative.
videos.director: Exile Edit, Nate Gross, Shane Reid
videos.additional_info:
adidas - Your Future Is Not Mine (2016)
The 2016 Adidas commercial "Your Future is Not Mine," directed by Terence Neale, features influential creatives like Aleali May, Luka Sabbat, and Iman Shumpert, among others, who march confidently towards an optimistic future, challenging the preconceived notions of a dystopian tomorrow. This campaign, produced by the advertising agency Johannes Leonardo, emphasizes individual empowerment and the message that one's future is theirs to create, rallying viewers to defy negative expectations and shape their own destinies through creativity and personal initiative.
Technique - Dystopian , Slow Motion , Suggestive
Director - Terence Neale
DOP - Sebastian Wintero
Editor - Exile Edit, Nate Gross, Shane Reid
Colorist - Company 3, Tom Poole
Original Source - Link

videos.alt_text: Tiny Fallout New Vegas by Flurdeh
videos.title: Tiny Fallout New Vegas by Flurdeh (2021)
videos.description: Flurdeh specializes in applying a "tilt-shift" effect to video games, transforming their expansive 3D environments into charming miniature dioramas. The videos share common features such as accelerated animations and a lower framerate, enhancing their resemblance to stop-motion animation rather than modern video game footage.
videos.director: Kevin Hensen
videos.additional_info:
Tiny Fallout New Vegas by Flurdeh (2021)
Flurdeh specializes in applying a "tilt-shift" effect to video games, transforming their expansive 3D environments into charming miniature dioramas. The videos share common features such as accelerated animations and a lower framerate, enhancing their resemblance to stop-motion animation rather than modern video game footage.
Technique - Dystopian , Tilt Shift , Video Game
Editor - Kevin Hensen
Original Source - Link

videos.alt_text: Tiny Cyberpunk 2077 by Flurdeh
videos.title: Tiny Cyberpunk 2077 by Flurdeh (2021)
videos.description: Flurdeh specializes in applying a "tilt-shift" effect to video games, transforming their expansive 3D environments into charming miniature dioramas. The videos share common features such as accelerated animations and a lower framerate, enhancing their resemblance to stop-motion animation rather than modern video game footage. An example highlighted is Cyberpunk, where the game's diverse settings are miniaturized, and characters are depicted as if they were tiny figurines engaging in everyday activities.
videos.director: Kevin Hensen
videos.additional_info:
Tiny Cyberpunk 2077 by Flurdeh (2021)
Flurdeh specializes in applying a "tilt-shift" effect to video games, transforming their expansive 3D environments into charming miniature dioramas. The videos share common features such as accelerated animations and a lower framerate, enhancing their resemblance to stop-motion animation rather than modern video game footage. An example highlighted is Cyberpunk, where the game's diverse settings are miniaturized, and characters are depicted as if they were tiny figurines engaging in everyday activities.
Technique - Aerial , Dystopian , Tilt Shift , Video Game
Editor - Kevin Hensen
Original Source - Link

Flurdeh specializes in applying a "tilt-shift" effect to video games, transforming their expansive 3D environments into charming miniature dioramas. The videos share common features such as accelerated animations and a lower framerate, enhancing their resemblance to stop-motion animation rather than modern video game footage. An example highlighted is Cyberpunk, where the game's diverse settings are miniaturized, and characters are depicted as if they were tiny figurines engaging in everyday activities.
Technique - Dystopian , High Angle , Tilt Shift , Video Game
Editor - Kevin Hensen
Original Source - Link

videos.alt_text: adidas - Your Future Is Not Mine
videos.title: adidas - Your Future Is Not Mine (2016)
videos.description: The 2016 Adidas commercial "Your Future is Not Mine," directed by Terence Neale, features influential creatives like Aleali May, Luka Sabbat, and Iman Shumpert, among others, who march confidently towards an optimistic future, challenging the preconceived notions of a dystopian tomorrow. This campaign, produced by the advertising agency Johannes Leonardo, emphasizes individual empowerment and the message that one's future is theirs to create, rallying viewers to defy negative expectations and shape their own destinies through creativity and personal initiative.
videos.director: Exile Edit, Nate Gross, Shane Reid
videos.additional_info:
